assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ledyard Financial Group, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Ledyard National Bank that provides retail and commercial banking, and wealth advisory services. It offers checking, savings, individual retirement, education, and health saving accounts; and debit and credit card services, online banking, and mobile wallet services. The company also provides lending services, which includes mortgages, home equity loans and line of credit, equity builder program, and consumer loans including personal line of credit, collateral, auto, and overdraft protection loans, as well as term loans, business line of credit, small business administration loans, and business letter of credit. In addition, it offers cash management services including cash flow management, remote deposit capture, zero balance account, and electronic payment solutions, such as ACH and wire, and risk management services comprising ACH and Check positive pay, credit card processing, lock box services, and other services. The company also provides acquisition and healthcare equipment financing, and escrow, trust and IOLTA accounts for practices and professionals; and money markets, conforming and jumbo, bridge, and construction loans for individuals and families. Further, it offers wealth management services including investment management; insurance Products, which includes business, key person, investment, permanent, term life, and universal insurances; fixed and variable annuities, disability income, stocks, corporate and municipal bonds, and mutual funds; and unit investment trusts, special services, brokered CDS, college and personal insurance planning services, portfolio review, and retirement account rollover services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hanover, New Hampshire.
